doc.title: Epic Breakdown
doc.snippet: Story 3.1 focuses on creating a welcoming landing page with introduction to 15ecosystem, overview of 15 skills concept, visual representation of three categories, navigation to categories and skills, language switcher, and proper RTL/LTR support.

doc.title: Product Requirements Document
doc.snippet: Landing page should include introduction to 15ecosystem, overview of the 15 skills concept, and navigation to main categories. Should be fully bilingual with RTL/LTR support.

doc.title: Architecture Document
doc.snippet: Pages use kebab-case for routes. Dynamic routes use [param].vue syntax. Use Nuxt UI components and i18n composables for bilingual support.

artifact.reason: Existing landing page that needs enhancement. Currently has basic structure with category cards but needs comprehensive introduction, better visual representation, and navigation links.
TopNav component already includes LanguageSwitcher. Can be reused for navigation. Already integrated in app.vue.
Language switcher component already exists and is integrated in TopNav. Provides language switching functionality.
Root component already has RTL/LTR support via useHead with dir attribute based on locale. TopNav is already included.
Category data with 3 categories (Health, Identity, Career) and bilingual names/descriptions. Can be imported and displayed on landing page.
Skill utilities can be used to get skill overview for landing page. getAllSkills() provides all 15 skills for overview.
English translations file. Has basic home translations but needs enhancement for comprehensive landing page content.
Persian translations file. Has basic home translations but needs enhancement for comprehensive landing page content.

constraint.description: Must use useI18n() composable and $t() for all text content. All content must be translatable via i18n keys.
Must support RTL layout for Persian (fa) and LTR layout for English (en). App.vue already has dir attribute support, but page content must align properly.
Must use Nuxt UI components (UCard, UButton, etc.) following portfolio design patterns. Follow existing component structure.
Navigation links must use Nuxt routing with i18n prefixes. Category routes: /categories/[slug] or /fa/categories/[slug]. Skill routes: /skills/[slug] or /fa/skills/[slug].
Use category data from app/data/fa/categories.ts or app/data/en/categories.ts. Use skill utilities from app/utils/skills.ts. Data is already organized and ready for consumption.
Must follow portfolio's modern design patterns: glassmorphism effects, subtle shadows, clean layouts, modern typography. Support dark mode.

tests.standards: Functional tests should verify language switching updates all content, RTL/LTR layout switching works correctly, navigation links work in both languages, and category display shows correct information. Visual tests should verify modern design, mobile responsiveness, dark mode support, and proper spacing.
tests.locations: Tests should be co-located with components or in __tests__ directories (future). For now, manual testing and browser testing are sufficient.
